author: Wayne Dyer
message: When you dance, your purpose is not to get to a certain place on the floor. It's to enjoy each step along the way.
title: Thought of the day

author: Orison Marden
message: The Creator has not given you a longing to do that which you have no ability to do.
title: Thought of the day

author: Sam Levenson
message: It's so simple to be wise. Just think of something stupid to say and then don't say it.
title: Thought of the day

author: Dalai Lama
message: Consider that not only do negative thoughts and emotions destroy our experience of peace, they also undermine our health.
title: Thought of the day
